use test;
0 rows returned

--create topic testtopic1;
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 varchar,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic1",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

-- BIGINT;

--load data dataset_1_1;

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -9223372036854775808 | wibble                                                                                        |
| 0                    | eek                                                                                           |
| 1                    | foo                                                                                           |
| 2                    | bar                                                                                           |
| 9223372036854775807  | wow                                                                                           |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
5 rows returned
select * from test_source_1 where col0=1;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1                    | foo                                                                                           |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_1 where col0=-9223372036854775808;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -9223372036854775808 | wibble                                                                                        |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_1 where col0=9223372036854775807;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 9223372036854775807  | wow                                                                                           |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_1 where col0=777;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1_2;

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;

| col0                 | col1                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -9223372036854775808 | wibble2                                                                                       |
| 0                    | eek                                                                                           |
| 1                    | foo2                                                                                          |
| 2                    | bar                                                                                           |
| 3                    | quux                                                                                          |
| 9223372036854775807  | wow2                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
6 rows returned

+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1                    | foo2                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned

| col0                 | col1                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -9223372036854775808 | wibble2                                                                                       |

| col0                 | col1                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 9223372036854775807  | wow2                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned

0 rows returned

--delete topic testtopic1;

-- INT;

--create topic testtopic2;
create source test_source_2(
    col0 int,
    col1 varchar,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic2",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_2_1;

select * from test_source_2 order by col0;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0        | col1                                                                                                   |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -2147483648 | wibble                                                                                                 |
| 0           | eek                                                                                                    |
| 1           | foo                                                                                                    |
| 2           | bar                                                                                                    |
| 2147483647  | wow                                                                                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
5 rows returned

| col0        | col1                                                                                                   |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1           | foo                                                                                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned

| 2147483647  | wow                                                                                                    |

-- TINYINT;

--create topic testtopic3;
create source test_source_3(
    col0 tinyint,
    col1 varchar,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic3",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_3_1;

select * from test_source_3 order by col0;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0 | col1                                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -128 | wibble                                                                                                        |
| 0    | eek                                                                                                           |
| 1    | foo                                                                                                           |
| 2    | bar                                                                                                           |
| 127  | wow                                                                                                           |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
5 rows returned
select * from test_source_3 where col0=1;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0 | col1                                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1    | foo                                                                                                           |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_3 where col0=-128;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0 | col1                                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -128 | wibble                                                                                                        |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_3 where col0=127;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0 | col1                                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 127  | wow                                                                                                           |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_3 where col0=23;

| col0 | col1                                                                                                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_3_2;

| col0 | col1                                                                                                          |

| -128 | wibble2                                                                                                       |

--delete topic testtopic3;

-- DOUBLE;

--create topic testtopic4;
create source test_source_4(
    col0 double,
    col1 varchar,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic4",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_4_1;

select * from test_source_4 order by col0;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -1234.4321                                               | wibble                                                   |
| 0                                                        | eek                                                      |
| 1.1                                                      | foo                                                      |
| 2.1                                                      | bar                                                      |
| 1234.4321                                                | wow                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
5 rows returned
select * from test_source_4 where col0=1.1;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1.1                                                      | foo                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_4 where col0=-1234.4321;

| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -1234.4321                                               | wibble                                                   |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_4 where col0=1234.4321;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1234.4321                                                | wow                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_4 where col0=13;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_4_2;

select * from test_source_4 order by col0;

| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -1234.4321                                               | wibble2                                                  |
| 0                                                        | eek                                                      |
| 1.1                                                      | foo2                                                     |
| 2.1                                                      | bar                                                      |
| 3.1                                                      | quux                                                     |
| 1234.4321                                                | wow2                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
6 rows returned

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1.1                                                      | foo2                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

| -1234.4321                                               | wibble2                                                  |

-- VARCHAR;

--create topic testtopic5;
create source test_source_5(
    col0 varchar,
    col1 varchar,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic5",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_5_1;

select * from test_source_5 order by col0;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| a                                                        | bar                                                      |
| abc                                                      | foo                                                      |
| abcd                                                     | eek                                                      |
| bcde                                                     | wibble                                                   |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
4 rows returned
select * from test_source_5 where col0='abc';
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| abc                                                      | foo                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_5 where col0='bcde';
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| bcde                                                     | wibble                                                   |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_5 where col0='not here';
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_5_2;

select * from test_source_5 order by col0;

| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |

| a                                                        | bar                                                      |
| abc                                                      | foo2                                                     |
| abcd                                                     | eek                                                      |
| bcde                                                     | wibble2                                                  |
| zyz                                                      | quux                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
5 rows returned
select * from test_source_5 where col0='abc';
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| abc                                                      | foo2                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_5 where col0='bcde';

| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| bcde                                                     | wibble2                                                  |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned

drop source test_source_5;
0 rows returned

--delete topic testtopic5;

-- DECIMAL;

--create topic testtopic6;
create source test_source_6(
    col0 decimal(10,2),
    col1 varchar,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic6",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_6_1;

select * from test_source_6 order by col0;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -87654321.65                                             | wibble                                                   |
| -4321.87                                                 | bar                                                      |
| 0.00                                                     | eek                                                      |
| 1234.99                                                  | foo                                                      |
| 78676543.86                                              | wow                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
5 rows returned
select * from test_source_6 where col0=1234.99;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1234.99                                                  | foo                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_6 where col0=-87654321.65;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -87654321.65                                             | wibble                                                   |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_6 where col0=78676543.86;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 78676543.86                                              | wow                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_6 where col0=777.777;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_6_2;

select * from test_source_6 order by col0;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -87654321.65                                             | wibble2                                                  |
| -4321.87                                                 | bar                                                      |
| 0.00                                                     | eek                                                      |
| 1234.99                                                  | foo2                                                     |
| 3000.10                                                  | quux                                                     |
| 78676543.86                                              | wow2                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
6 rows returned
select * from test_source_6 where col0=1234.99;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1234.99                                                  | foo2                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_6 where col0=-87654321.65;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -87654321.65                                             | wibble2                                                  |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_6 where col0=78676543.86;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                                                     | col1                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 78676543.86                                              | wow2                                                     |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned

drop source test_source_6;
0 rows returned

--delete topic testtopic6;

-- TIMESTAMP;

--create topic testtopic7;
create source test_source_7(
    col0 timestamp(6),
    col1 varchar,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic7",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_7_1;

select * from test_source_7 order by col0;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                       | col1                                                                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1987-08-22 11:15:54.743645 | bar                                                                                     |
| 2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456 | foo                                                                                     |
| 2035-11-17 23:47:12.373443 | wibble                                                                                  |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
3 rows returned
select * from test_source_7 where col0='2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456';
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                       | col1                                                                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456 | foo                                                                                     |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_7 where col0='2035-11-17 23:47:12.373443';
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                       | col1                                                                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 2035-11-17 23:47:12.373443 | wibble                                                                                  |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_7 where col0='1971-05-25 15:23:09.474646';
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                       | col1                                                                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_7_2;

select * from test_source_7 order by col0;
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                       | col1                                                                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1987-08-22 11:15:54.743645 | bar                                                                                     |
| 1991-12-02 09:37:32.464648 | quux                                                                                    |
| 2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456 | foo2                                                                                    |
| 2035-11-17 23:47:12.373443 | wibble2                                                                                 |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
4 rows returned
select * from test_source_7 where col0='2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456';
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                       | col1                                                                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456 | foo2                                                                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
select * from test_source_7 where col0='2035-11-17 23:47:12.373443';
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                       | col1                                                                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 2035-11-17 23:47:12.373443 | wibble2                                                                                 |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned

drop source test_source_7;
0 rows returned

--delete topic testtopic7;

-- COMPOSITE;

--create topic testtopic8;
create source test_source_8(
    col0 tinyint,
    col1 int,
    col2 bigint,
    col3 double,
    col4 decimal(10, 2),
    col5 varchar,
    col6 timestamp,
    col7 varchar,
    primary key (col0, col1, col2, col3, col4, col5, col6)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic8",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        meta("key").k1,
        meta("key").k2,
        meta("key").k3,
        meta("key").k4,
        meta("key").k5,
        meta("key").k6,
        v7
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_8_1;

set max_line_width 250;
0 rows returned

select * from test_source_8 order by col0,col1,col2,col3,col4,col5,col6;
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0 | col1        | col2                 | col3                                      | col4                                      | col5                                      | col6                       | col7                                      |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo000                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo001                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo002                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo003                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo004                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo005                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo006                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo007                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 8234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo008                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 8234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo009                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 8234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo010                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 8234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo011                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 8234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo012                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 8234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo013                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 8234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo014                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 8234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo015                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 6000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo016                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 6000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo017                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 6000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo018                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 6000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo019                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 6000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo020                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 6000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo021                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 6000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo022                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 6000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo023                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 6000                 | 8234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo024                                    |

2 rows returned

-- should return one row as column has no FSP;
select * from test_source_8 where col0=10 and col1=500 and col2=1000 and col3=8234.4321 and col4=72345678.99 and col5='str1' and col6='2021-02-13 21:11:08' order by col0,col1,col2,col3,col4,col5,col6;
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0 | col1        | col2                 | col3                                      | col4                                      | col5                                      | col6                       | col7                                      |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 10   | 500         | 1000                 | 8234.4321                                 | 72345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2021-02-13 21:11:08.000000 | foo045                                    |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned
-- should return zero rows as not exact match;
select * from test_source_8 where col0=10 and col1=500 and col2=1000 and col3=8234.4321 and col4=72345678.99 and col5='str1' and col6='2021-02-13 21:11:07.645465' order by col0,col1,col2,col3,col4,col5,col6;
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0 | col1        | col2                 | col3                                      | col4                                      | col5                                      | col6                       | col7                                      |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
0 rows returned

drop source test_source_8;
0 rows returned

--delete topic testtopic8;

-- COMPOSITE with columns in arbitrary order;

--create topic testtopic9;
create source test_source_9(
    col0 tinyint,
    col1 int,
    col2 bigint,
    col3 double,
    col4 decimal(10, 2),
    col5 varchar,
    col6 timestamp,
    col7 varchar,
    primary key (col3, col1, col5)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic9",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        v0,
        meta("key").k1,
        v2,
        meta("key").k0,
        v4,
        meta("key").k2,
        v6,
        v7
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_9;

set max_line_width 250;
0 rows returned

select * from test_source_9 order by col7;
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0 | col1        | col2                 | col3                                      | col4                                      | col5                                      | col6                       | col7                                      |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo000                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo001                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 4321.5432                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo002                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 4321.5432                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo003                                    |
| 10   | 200         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo004                                    |
| 10   | 200         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo005                                    |
| 10   | 200         | 1000                 | 4321.5432                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo006                                    |
| 10   | 200         | 1000                 | 4321.5432                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo007                                    |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
8 rows returned
select * from test_source_9 where col3 = 1234.4321 order by col7;
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0 | col1        | col2                 | col3                                      | col4                                      | col5                                      | col6                       | col7                                      |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo000                                    |
| 10   | 100         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo001                                    |
| 10   | 200         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo004                                    |
| 10   | 200         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo005                                    |

| col0 | col1        | col2                 | col3                                      | col4                                      | col5                                      | col6                       | col7                                      |

| 10   | 200         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo004                                    |
| 10   | 200         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str2                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo005                                    |

2 rows returned
select * from test_source_9 where col3 = 1234.4321 and col1 = 200 and col5 = 'str1' order by col7;
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0 | col1        | col2                 | col3                                      | col4                                      | col5                                      | col6                       | col7                                      |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 10   | 200         | 1000                 | 1234.4321                                 | 12345678.99                               | str1                                      | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 | foo004                                    |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
1 rows returned

drop source test_source_9;
0 rows returned

--delete topic testtopic9;

-- nulls in PK will fail to be ingested;

--create topic testtopic10;
create source test_source_10(
    col0 int,
    col1 int,
    col2 int,
    col3 varchar,
    primary key (col0, col1, col2)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic10",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        meta("key").k1,
        meta("key").k2,
        v3
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_10 no wait;

--pause 1000;

select * from test_source_10;
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0        | col1        | col2        | col3                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
0 rows returned

drop source test_source_10;
0 rows returned

--delete topic testtopic10;
